title: Petrinets
description: This is the Petri net specification.

stencils.title: Diagram
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="800"    height="600"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <g pointer-events="fill" >     <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="0,0 0,590 9,599 799,599 799,9 790,0" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />     <rect id="diagramcanvas" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="790" height="590" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="white" />      <text font-size="22" id="diagramtext" x="400" y="25" oryx:align="top center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Version
properties.description: This defines the Version number of the Diagram.

properties.title: Author
properties.description: This holds the name of the author of the Diagram.

properties.title: Language
properties.description: This holds the name of the language in which text is written.

properties.title: CreationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was created.

properties.title: ModificationDate
properties.description: This defines the date on which the Diagram was last modified.

properties.title: Documentation
properties.description: The modeler may add optional text documentation about the Diagram.

stencils.title: Transition
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="82"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="39" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="39" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="20" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="10 10" oryx:maximumSize="160 160" >     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="40" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="white" />      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="20" y="18" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black" oryx:fittoelem="taskrect"></text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This is a unique Id that distinguishes the Diagram from other Diagrams.

stencils.title: Empty Transition
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="12"    height="52"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>  <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="5" oryx:cy="25" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill"  oryx:minimumSize="10 50">     <rect id="taskrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="10" height="50" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="black" />         </g> </svg>

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This is a unique Id that distinguishes the Diagram from other Diagrams.

stencils.title: Place
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg         xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"         xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"     width="40"     height="40"     version="1.1">   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="32 32">     <circle oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" cx="16" cy="16" r="15" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1"/>      <text font-size="12" id="text" x="28" y="4" stroke="black"></text>          <g id="numTokens0"></g>     <g id="numTokens1">         <circle cx="16" cy="16" r="6" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="black"/>     </g>     <g id="numTokens2">         <circle cx="16" cy="10" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="black"/>         <circle cx="16" cy="22" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="black"/>     </g>     <g id="numTokens3">         <circle cx="16" cy="9" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="black"/>         <circle cx="10" cy="20" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="black"/>         <circle cx="22" cy="20" r="4" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="black"/>     </g>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This is a unique Id that distinguishes the Diagram from other Diagrams.

stencils.title: Arc
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <defs>      <marker id="end" refX="15" refY="5" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="15" markerHeight="10" orient="auto">      <path d="M 0 0 L 15 5 L 0 10 L 0 0" fill="black" stroke="black" />     </marker>  </defs>  <g>      <path id="edge" d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" marker-end="url(#end)" />      <text font-size="14" id="text" x="47" y="7" oryx:edgePosition="midtop"></text>  </g> </svg>

properties.title: Id
properties.description: This is a unique Id that distinguishes the Diagram from other Diagrams.
